name: Captain Pepe –Archer Master
description:
The struggle between the Captain Pepe and the turtle Lilly still continues.
Captain Pepe in this game is trying to be a good shooter, of course, the cute Lilly turtle has a kickback each time. There are several arrows, which different in design and strength. In this game, not only needs to be well targeted, but it should also be a good mathematician who will calculate the right ratio of power and angle of lightning.
In the second mode turtle Lilly is archer, she decided to hit Captain Pepe, who is now flying with the sky, and from that height she is easy prey, so she is tireless to hit him many times.
It's still unclear who will be the winner. Will the hunter eventually become a prey?
publishers: NS WEB DEVELOPMENT DOO NOVI SAD
